description: Try our easy to follow Easy Beef Chow Mein recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Beef Chow Mein Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Maggi 2 Minute Instant Beef Noodles
1 pkt Maggi Your Meal Your Way Chow Mein
1 kg McCain frozen seasonal mix vegetables

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1 cup water and Maggi recipe base in a small jug. Add sauce mixture to mince mixture and bring to the boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Add noodles and toss to combine. Divide among bowls and serve.
